title: Liu awaiting spring
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales Film and Television Office, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/AIDS (Disease)
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Gay and lesbian studies
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Coming out (Sexual orientation)
description: Set against traditional Chinese music and imagery such as calligraphy and performance art a young gay Chinese man faces the dilemma of "coming out" to his family. His dilemma is complicated by the fact that one of their relatives has died from AIDS.
